channel.description:
https://www.gauntlet-rpg.com/1-forward/summer-series-fitd-moth-light
Rach and Rich continue their second Summer Series. This series covers games in the Forged in the Dark (FitD) style of PbtA games. This third episode features Justin Ford, creator of *Moth-Light* and host of the Hacked in the Dark podcast
Timecodes: 00:01:55 - **Setting Position and Effect** - using flashbacks 00:10:05 - **Progress Clock** on *Moth-Light* 00:20:13 - **The Score** - Theta and Plus One try to liberate a solar core
You can find *Moth-Light* here: https://moth-lands.itch.io/moth-light Hacked in the Dark podcast can be found here: https://www.buzzsprout.com/1249355
